body_html: Adding a stream_executor dependency to gpu_runtime should be fine. stream_executor is a header-only rule and has a separate implementation rule (all these rules are split for the changes described in 5c7f9e3). May have just been an omission when I did the split.
body_text: Adding a stream_executor dependency to gpu_runtime should be fine. stream_executor is a header-only rule and has a separate implementation rule (all these rules are split for the changes described in 5c7f9e3). May have just been an omission when I did the split.
body: Adding a stream_executor dependency to gpu_runtime should be fine. stream_executor is a header-only rule and has a separate implementation rule (all these rules are split for the changes described in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/5c7f9e31). May have just been an omission when I did the split.
